attributes.name: correlation_type
attributes.description: The type of performed cross correlations as a string. Only useful if the same for all cross correlations, otherwise that information must be stored in the provenance records of the single cross correlations.

attributes.name: correlation_type
attributes.description: The number of cross correlations used to calculate the stack.

attributes.name: stacking_method
attributes.description: The method used to create the stack.

attributes.name: station_id_A
attributes.description: The SEED identifier of station A.

attributes.name: station_id_B
attributes.description: The SEED identifier of station B.
